text:
Betfair announced its first master sponsorship of a football team in Brazil.

'Palmeiras and Betfair, one of the largest online betting companies in the world, announced this Saturday (14) a two-year sponsorship agreement. The contract provides for exposure of the brand in the master property of the Palmeiras women's soccer team uniform and insertion in all official digital content exclusive to the Greatest Champion in Brazil.'

elements.text:

text: Imagine the scenario where Ukraine wins. So the confusion can be summarised as such: is the second favourite on the Winner market necessarily the favourite to come second (i.e winner of the winner wo Ukraine market)? As Michael said, very little liquidity in the latter market anyway so not much opportunity, but possible dislocations are understandable given the strange link. It's like Win Vs Place on steroids.
